nodes.bodyText: The class is identical to AbstractScoreHibernateTypeTest with only a single difference: the AbstractTestJpaEntity. I wonder if the code can be reused - e.g. by just providing different abstract entity classes.

afterCommit.message: Add JPA AttributeConverters for Score entities

nodes.bodyText:
This should not be in the "impl" package, but the "api" instead.
So org.optaplanner.persistence.jpa.api.score.buildin.bendable.
@triceo I 'd even argue we want to drop the ".persistence" part in that url.
So org.optaplanner.jpa.api.score.buildin.bendable.

nodes.bodyText: Less is more. Less code is more maintenable. Why do we need all these extra lines?
